block.p: Urban Safari Shorts are back -- in a small, small way. And while they seem to be getting teenier on the bottom, this spring you'll find something up top, too. No longer just for painters, safari guides and Charlie's Angels, one-piece jumpsuits are fast becoming city staples. The sexy onesie for grown-ups has its perks (getting dressed is a snap) but the trend can be tricky to pull off. ''They're great for going from daytime to clubbing, but you've got to have the body,'' said Maggie Wachsberger, whose Los Angeles boutique Malgosia, (323) 782-9188, can't keep Serfontaine's disco-inspired jean jumpsuit ($255) in stock. Pair it with stilettos and Pilates-toned legs and you've got a look.
